name: Executive Assistant / Помощник Генерального Менеджера
description:
General responsibilities:

  • provide administrative support for the General Manager as requested to include:
    • distribution of correspondence
    • distribute incoming mail
    • phone coverage
    • filling and maintaining of files
    • assist in preparation of various documents
    • assist with maintenance of various databases


General requirements:

  • 1+ years of experience in Personal Assistant position
  • fluent English (written & oral)
  • higher Diploma


Benefits:

  • competitive wages
  • career opportunities
  • medical insurance
  • vacation, sick/personal and holiday pay
  • employee discounts on hotel rooms, restaurant outlet meals and retail items
  • complimentary employee meals
